net.objectzoo.delegates
Interface FuncAsyncResult<R>

Type Parameters:
R - The result type returned by the FuncAsync
All Superinterfaces:
ActionAsyncResult
public interface FuncAsyncResult<R>
extends ActionAsyncResult

A FuncAsyncResult represents the result of an FuncAsync invocation. Methods are provided to check if the invocation is complete, to wait for its completion, and to check the outcome of the FuncAsync. The outcome can be checked using the method endInvokeReturn() when the FuncAsync has completed, blocking if necessary until it is ready. Cancellation is performed by the cancel(boolean) method. Additional methods are provided to determine if the FuncAsync completed normally or was cancelled. Once a FuncAsync has completed, the FuncAsync cannot be cancelled.

Author:
tilmann
See Also:
FuncAsync

cancel

boolean cancel(boolean mayInterruptIfRunning)
Attempts to cancel invocation of this FuncAsync. This attempt will fail if the FuncAsync has already completed, has already been cancelled, or could not be cancelled for some other reason. If successful, and this FuncAsync has not started when cancel(boolean) is called, this FuncAsync should never run. If the FuncAsync has already started, then the mayInterruptIfRunning parameter determines whether the thread executing this FuncAsync should be interrupted in an attempt to stop the FuncAsync.

After this method returns, subsequent calls to isDone() will always return true. Subsequent calls to isCancelled() will always return true if this method returned true.

Specified by:
cancel in interface ActionAsyncResult
Parameters:
mayInterruptIfRunning - true if the thread executing this uncAsync should be interrupted; otherwise, in-progress FuncAsyncs are allowed to complete
Returns:
false if the FuncAsync could not be cancelled, typically because it has already completed normally; true otherwise

isCancelled

boolean isCancelled()
Returns true if this FuncAsync was cancelled before it completed normally.

Specified by:
isCancelled in interface ActionAsyncResult
Returns:
true if this FuncAsync was cancelled before it completed

isDone

boolean isDone()
Returns true if this FuncAsync completed. Completion may be due to normal termination, an exception, or cancellation -- in all of these cases, this method will return true.

Specified by:
isDone in interface ActionAsyncResult
Returns:
true if this FuncAsync completed

                  throws InterruptedException,
